description.raw:
* Bring launcher and machine list back to dashboard.
* Launcher now uses `machinetypes` (no more hardcoded types)
* Launcher only shows for users who have write permission to `simulators`
* Added copy-to-clipboard for machine IP on item


## User who can launch machines

![launcher.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/3248412523-launcher.gif)


## User who can't launch machines but has access to some machines (there would be no machines listed if they don't have access to any)

![launcherno.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1196718187-launcherno.png)

  • Launcher now uses machinetypes (no more hardcoded types)
  • Launcher only shows for users who have write permission to simulators
  • Added copy-to-clipboard for machine IP on item
